<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;RetInst = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a5f6182886dc2f96c204299e92c1565d5">dyn&#95;cast&#95;or&#95;null&lt;ReturnInst&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#ae76959fe811ba090de4cba69ac00f1da">B</a>.getTerminator());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RetInst)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type">Type</a> &#42;NewRetTy = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-pointertypeanalysis-cpp-/#aba29b35909e39c48517e7475412c776a">classifyPointerType</a>(RetInst-&gt;getReturnValue(), Map);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RetTy)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><Highlight kind="normal">        RetTy = NewRetTy;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RetTy != NewRetTy)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><Highlight kind="normal">        RetTy = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/typedpointertype/#ad0b317acb44e242226165a34d550702d">TypedPointerType::get</a>(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><Highlight kind="normal">            <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/type/#a7ba5de75f50bb4a4ba920698edf39b28">Type::getInt8Ty</a>(Ctx), <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getReturnType()-&gt;getPointerAddressSpace());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (TargetTy == Ty)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180" lineLink="#ac6745cfa7af2beebe88a7d3609c7875d"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="#ac6745cfa7af2beebe88a7d3609c7875d">classifyGlobalCtorPointerType</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable">GlobalVariable</a> &amp;GV,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/dxil/#a57d4be532c191d9bb111cecdd1a63709">PointerTypeMap</a> &amp;Map) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CA = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ac4fc845f5ed92de63cd4474f128f5fc5">cast&lt;ConstantArray&gt;</a>(GV.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/globalvariable/#a0698d5bcabbfbca4f56a9d7a81cecb25">getInitializer</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Type for global ctor should be array of &#123; i32, void ()&#42;, i8&#42; &#125;.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
